page.title: 05Hepscott Village 2
page.content: Hepscott Hall is a listed building and is at present being sold for Â£139,000.It is reputed to be haunted by "the White Lady".She has been seen twice recently.There are no old people's homes in Hepscott,although near by is {Hepscott Park,}a hospital for the aged.The WI.uses the {Parish {Hall,}as do keep fit classes, "drop-in"clubs and all village meetings.{Shopvans}selling wholefoods and wet fish visit the village weekly.Nearly everyone has at least one car.The{bus}fare to Morpeth is 46p.The service 446 runs between Blyth and Morpeth hourly.Most people work in Morpeth or Newcastle.Hepscott is a quiet ,attractive village.
